At once, she pulled her feet away from his grip what little bit she could, and then with all the force in her legs kicked out. The slim teen was far from a mule, but it was still the best kick she could muster, and it landed square on Borin's nose. If her heel had been less soft, or her legs less willowy, or her bindings less restrictive, it probably would have caused extreme pain.

But she was a tightly-tied, wispy sixteen-year-old girl. He recoiled from the blow, saw a moment of stars, and then was himself again. Kyra had followed the kick with a renewed effort to escape, but to no avail. A moment later, the angry farmer was hauling her back onto the bale of hay.
"How dare you!" Kyra sputtered, spitting the gag from her mouth enough to speak. "I'll never give in to your evil! I won't so much as smirk--" she was saying, as Borin shoved the gag back in place and tied it again around her head. He stormed back to where her feet were still suspended in the air.

"That was a good move, but a damn stupid one!" he steamed, though on the inside, he was pleased. Her defiance only further inflamed him. "And you'll more than giggle, girl. You'll laugh until you die!"
There were stories of monsters that kidnapped young girls and subjected them to that very fate, but of course Borin had no intention of truly hurting the young princess. But he did plan on using her well, and even as she shouted another muffled protest into her gag, he seized her slender ankles and began scratching her bare soles.

Kyra inhaled sharply as the sensation reached her, but pressed her eyes shut. The girl was determined not to give the filthy farmer the pleasure of seeing her laugh--it was repulsive enough he was touching her royal person, and her bare feet at that!

Borin let out a low groan as he raked the tips of his nails over her beautiful feet. She wasn't laughing, but he could tell from the way she curled and flexed her toes and tried to pull her feet away that she was feeling the effects of the tickle torture. She was definitely a ticklish young girl--he didn't even know about the witch's curse, which amplified the effect even more! He switched from his random attack and put all five nails against the top of her feet, then slo-o-o-owly dragged them down her soles, from toes to heel. Kyra pulled as hard as she could, raising her back totally free of the hay bale and letting a faint 'eep!' out of her pretty lips as Borin did so. Naturally, he repeated the move a second time, slower, and then repeated it in reverse. Each time, Kyra let out a faintly louder sound.

"That's a good girl," Borin purred. "Let it out. You can even beg, if you want. Beg me to stop."

Kyra shook her head furiously.
"Your choice, girly-girl," the farmer replied, and he raked down her soles again, then back up them, and then down yet again, with no pause for the girl to catch a breath. She was now rolling from side to side on the hay bale, her teeth clenched firmly around the cloth gag, the picture of determined resistance.

Next, Borin used just his index and pointer fingers, wiggling them against the soft skin just under her cute bubble toes. He kept it up until she was panting and her eyes shot open, and in between gasps the teen let out a few unwilling moans that were so torturously close to being giggles.

"There it is," Borin boasted. "Let it out, girl! Let it out!" And he dug in even harder, now adding in his thumbs which he used to tickle her delicate arches.

"Nnnnn!" Kyra cried. "Nnnnnnnnnnnnnnn!" The whine was pained and low and desperate. She was breaking, and all the kicks she managed did nothing to slow Borin.
"I've got very strong hands. All the fieldwork," he explained, keeping the tickle going ceaselessly. "You might as well just take a real breathe and start begging now. I'll be merciful then, really!"

"No!" Kyra cried out, thrashing her head from side to side violently. The gag had fallen aside again, but Borin was okay with that. He expected to hear her beg anyhow.
"I'll never give in!"

Then, all at once, Borin set in with all five fingers, each worming against their own specific part of the princess' teenage feet, and the girl's cry of surprise broke into a ceaseless string of tortured laughter.

"Yes! Yes! That's it!" Borin cried out victoriously, watching the beautiful princess thrash from side to side, barefoot and helpless against his torture. It was the crowning moment of his entire life so far. Her laughter was as sweet and innocent as the rest of her, he noticed with glee. He stopped and watched the girl continue to wiggle and shiver as the sensation continued to echo through her tiny body.

He turned to the pile of tools he'd collected earlier and picked up a stiff brush. He carried it to Kyra's head.
"That's just my welcome. You've got such wonderful little feet. I've never even heard of anything like it. Don't worry, I plan on keeping my hands on them as much as possible. But there are other...options. See this, girl?" he asked, lifting the brush. "We use it to clean the horses. The quills are mighty tough. I've always been curious " He lifted the gag and shoved it back into her mouth. "For this, I can't risk you waking the wife," he explained, and slowly stalked back to the girl's struggling feet, smiling mockingly. Internally, Kyra was already wincing. The young princess was so furious and yet very frightened. She didn't know how she was going to get out of this--she only knew she had to keep fighting until she saw a chance to escape.

Borin lifted the brush and set it against Kyra's delicate teenaged soles. The farmer and the girl locked eyes, and

123112.content:
"Borin!" called a voice, and it was the farmer's turn to freeze in shock.
"Gods be damned!" he hissed, racing to Kyra's head. Images ran through his mind of his wife peering in the barn door just in time to see him raking at Kyra's young soles. He'd never, ever hear the end of it.

He stuffed the gag deeper into Kyra's mouth and snarled into her ear while she gagged. "Not a word, girl! Not so much as a hiss! If my wife finds you, I swear on all the spirits I'll call you a witch and say you enchanted me. My wife won't believe it, but that won't stop her from having you burned at the stake. She's a jealous woman and whatever pain she'll inflict on me will be damnably worse for a thing like you."

He straightened and raced from the barn.
"Over here, over here, woman," he called, and the sounds of voices began to sink away from the barn.

Alone and still tied, Kyra was unsure what to do. She was alone, and for the moment, the attack on her feet had stopped. She wasn't sure if Borin was likely to return, or if his suspicious wife would drag him back to the farmhouse. Should she make a noise and risk the woman's possible fury? Kyra was certain about one thing: the gag in her mouth had to go. It was vile; filthier than any cloth she'd ever been near. She chewed and spat and worked the cloth again out of her mouth. At least Borin was no trained bandit, she thought. Accentuate the positive!

Next, she continued to wiggle her wrists. Borin had clearly been careful when he bound her, and the knots were practiced and tight. Kyra's only hope lay in her thin frame--she twisted and pulled and turned her wrists, struggling to slide them out of the ropework.
"Stay calm," she whispered to herself. "You don't know how long you have. He could be back. He might not. Just stay calm and be careful. You can do this."

Kyra meant what she said. She'd never yet, in her young life, found a problem she couldn't solve. She was pretty, funny, charming, intelligent, energetic, and if all else failed, wealthy. Now, though, she had to rely on her exceptional agility and flexibility.
"This might hurt," she grumbled, once her hand was in position. With a great tug, she pulled her fingers through the somewhat-loosened binding.
"Yes!" she cried, using her free, if somewhat sore, hand to attack the loop around her other wrist. Within a minute, her arms were free and she shoved the gag away from her body entirely. Now she lay on a bale of hay, her feet still tightly looped in leather above her, annoyingly hard to reach. By performing the most awkward sit-up of her life, she could reach her ankles, but Borin's knots were out of reach. The best Kyra could do was attempt to pull at the bindings and make them looser. Again, her tiny feet were crucial to her escape.

She was making good headway when a noise outside the barn sent her heart racing.
"Almost, almost," Borin's voice announced. "I'm just to check the harness for a moment, and I'll be right in. Yes, yes. No, just a moment. No, I don't look sweaty. It was just some heavy lifting, is all."

"Go time," Kyra said, trying to keep from whimpering. Whatever Borin had planned for his 'moment,' she wanted no part of it. Time was running out...

A moment later, Borin stepped into the barn. His eyes widened when he saw

The princess tried to unravel the knots, and while the girl did have capable fingers, she couldn't reach far enough, long enough, to make any headway.

"No no no!" She whimpered, kicking helplessly against the bindings. Her feet were still tingling from Borin's merciless tickling, and she didn't think she'd have any better chance at escape than now.

But she was still kicking and mewling furiously when the farmer returned, a smug smirk on his face.

"Such a fiery girl!" he said, slapping away her barrage of meager punches and seizing up her slender arms. He twisted slightly, sending a shock of pain up Kyra's arms. She let out a yelp and froze--no man had ever caused her physical pain before, not intentionally. Her luminous eyes met his and she realized just how much power the man had over her.

"That's right," Borin said. "One twist and I could snap your delicate little arms like a twig. Two twigs. Maybe I will. After all, it makes you no less beautiful if your arms are broken. Now, the girl could only barely wiggle her body from side to side. Borin even pulled the knots around her ankles tight again, scratching a finger down her tender soles again and prompting Kyra to let out a surprised giggle.

"That was a bad thing to try," he chided, dragging yet another finger down her other soft sole. "How should I punish you, do you think? Because you're so pretty, I'll let you choose. They're all going to be endless fun for me, I promise." Again, Borin ran a hungry eye down the beautiful girl's captive body, stretched out and exposed before him. "You know, for such a skinny young girl, you do have an amazing rack," he announced, admiring the gentle curves of her perky, firm breasts, protected from his gaze by only a thin layer of fabric.

"I undo your gag, and put this brush to these gentle little feetsies of yours. I'll keep going until you tell me to stop, and then I will stop, as per your order!" Kyra narrowed her gaze, waiting for his terms. Borin grinned wickedly. "But when you do, I take off that robe and get to see all the bounty of your youth!"

Kyra shuddered in horror.

"I'll never let a monster like you touch me so," she growled bravely, but her eyes belied her fear.

"Of course you will. I can't wait! But there's another option. Instead of a brush, I gag you up nice and tight, pull up a chair, and you give me a footjob." He waited for Kyra's reaction of horror, and when it didn't come, he added. Once you do that, I take you out and set you free. This way, we both win. It's not like my wife would let me keep you. I might even toss in a few coins to help you out if you do a good enough job. Sound fair?"

Kyra was horrified at both options. She longed to be free from this wretched madman, but how could a princess be expected to pay such a humiliating price?

Kyra lied on her back against the floor, panting and gasping for air. Her eyes noticed four doors extruding from the circular wall around her, unsure the meaning behind it all.

"Choose one of the doors. If you pass the trial, you may leave. If you don't want to take the trial, that's fine with me; it just means you'll get tickled again in a much crueler manner," the witch explained what shall happen next, and it was now up to Kyra to decide her fate.

Maybe it was just her slippers playing tricks on the nerves of her recently tortured feet, but the floor felt awfully spongy and soft. About halfway across, this trial seemed to be fairly straightforward so far, but then her legs suddenly froze. She tried to lift up her feet, but it was as if they were glued onto the floor. From myths and legends that she have read as a little girl, there had been countless of great heroes that took on challenging trials much like the one the witch will be giving her. Her only clothing was what looked like a cloth strip around her breasts- excluding her bracelet and seashell necklace.

"I am the Princess of this kingdom. If you let me go free, I will pardon your insolent treatment of me. Otherwise, my father, the king, will have you executed."

"Ho ho! The Princess, you say? With that kind of body, I would have to believe you and all the more reason why we can't let you go. Ain't that right, boys?"

Would kind of 'fun' do these men have installed for her?
15222.title: Strap Kyra to a rack in the adjacent room

152222.content:
One of the men whispered something to his mate who laughed out loud. The leader of the gang demanded to know the proposal, chuckled, and approved. The small crowd cheered. Princess Kyra's anger rose. In spite of her predicatment she called "I command you to let me go. Your lives might be spared only if you do that immediately. And what are you laughing about anyway?" The man who spoke to her first approached her and stood next to the tied up princess. He admired the expensive fur coated bath robe that was still held in place by it's single belt. With a firm touch his hand landed on the girl's bare thigh just above her kneecap. She flinched from the unwanted male touch and shuddered.

When she opened her mouth to protest he was quicker. "You are the princess. Right?" When she confirmed, he said "We will do a challenge now. This will prove whether you are a proper princess." When he waved his hand one of his buddies came over with a large can of

1 - wine
2 - water
3 - beer

"After you drank this we will entertain you for some time. Some hours to say. A proper princess will be quiet and hold it." "Hold what?" she was confused. "This". He replied, wiggled his index finger under her bathrobe and probed the place just above her pubic bone. Princess Kyra screamed from the agony of ticklish feeling and from the understanding of what was about to happen.
152222.title: They forced something down her throat to drink!

1522221.content:
The wandering princess had been captured. Lying flat on the medieval rack with her limbs stretched apart in opposite directions, she was utterly helpless in her situation. Despite identifying herself as a princess, her captors didn't take her words seriously. It wasn't that they didn't believe her; it was that they are even more motivated to keep her tied up if she really did carry such high status. She knew that these men had no intentions of freeing her, especially not after what they had just told her. She was frightened by what these men were planning to do to her. What was she supposed to drink? What did they mean by entertaining her for some hours? She had never been taught or told that there was such a test to prove that one is a princess. Being quiet and hold the fluids within her body for the next few hours was supposed to be how she would proof herself. She had never done this before and couldn’t trust these men at all for keeping her constricted like this. Blindfolded, the princess couldn’t see what was happening or what these men were up to.

A hand reached out to grab her jaw before yanking her mouth open just wide enough to shove a ring-shaped gag in her mouth, secured by a strap around her head. With her mouth forcefully kept open, she lost her ability to speak and form words. All she could do was emit a frightened wincing noise as she these men set things up. A pair of hands secured each side of her head, ensuring that she kept facing upwards. Meanwhile, someone else inserted the narrow end of a metallic funnel into the hole of ring-shaped gag. Kyra could feel her heart pounding faster as her breathing became more rapid and shallow the moment she felt a metal tube entering halfway in her mouth. Someone then lifted a large, heavy can before tilting it slightly to pour the red-colored wine into the funnel.

Kyra felt a room-temperature unknown fluid being poured into her mouth. Initially, she refused to gulp it down, relying on her nose to breathe. It wasn’t long until a finger on either side pressed the sides of her nose, pinching her nostrils shut. Unable to breathe, the girl panicked and thrashed around with what little range of motion her joints could make use of. Ten seconds later, she was desperate for air and reluctantly gulped down the fluids, offering her a burning taste that she had never experienced before. She was afraid what they were forcing her to drink, but she consumed the liquid nevertheless. The seemingly never ending steam of fluid flowing into her mouth made her worried as to when it would stop, but after several swallows, the funnel was emptied, granting her access to air. After a few seconds of resting with her breasts rising and falling, another volume of wine was poured down the funnel, forcing the princess to continue drinking if she wishes to breathe.

For the next five minutes, Kyra was forced to drink more than she has ever had in such a short duration of time. It didn’t stop until the entire large can of wine was emptied. Her body started to feel oddly warm.

What did these men do next to entertain her?
1522221.title: Wine

choices: She had trouble paying for her drink
She meets a group of adventurers
154.content:
Since it was late at night, most of the townsfolk had gone to bed, so Kyra wandered into one of the few places that was still open. It was a quaint little tavern, full of adorable, drunk villagers with their faces covered in scars and scowls. Of course, after they saw the attractive young princess step inside, their scowls turning into smiles. A more experienced woman might have called them leers, but it was all the same to Kyra.

"Welcome, welcome!" the portly innkeeper said warmly. He was a bald man with a rotund figure, but he seemed friendly enough. Another might consider him too friendly as he led her into his establishment, his hand a bit too low on her shapely hip. "Come in, warm yourself up, have a drink!"

Kyra smiled and looked around. She had never been in a tavern before, but she had heard stories about them. She couldn't remember how many times a group of adventurers met in a tavern and went off and … adventured. She was never sure what an adventure was, exactly, but often it involved a dragon or a princess or a princess held captive by a dragon. In any case, it seemed like good fun.

She wasn't sure she was dressed for visiting a tavern in a white fluffy bathrobe and white slippers, but judging by the looks of the other inhabitants, no one disapproved of her attire, so she made sure that the cloth belt was tied firmly around her waist and sat down at a table.

"Um, a drink?" Her father had always been strict about her and alcohol … but he wasn't here with her. "I'll have a glass of wine, please."

The barkeep poured her a glass of something red and tart, and she smiled to herself as she sipped it. She realized that she was in the place were adventures usually began, and hers was just beginning.

What happens next in Princess Kyra's Ticklish Rape Adventure?
154.title: Visit a Tavern

choices: Kyra slept with the two girls.
1543.content:
Kyra was halfway finished with her glass of wine when she saw a group of people enter the tavern. The first was a large man with a mop of black hair and a heroic chin, wearing chainmail and a sword on his back. The second was a beautiful woman in an elegant red gown with bright red hair, carrying a staff. The third was another woman with her black hair in a long ponytail wearing a cloak over tight leather with a dagger at the belt tied around her shapely hips.

They were, Kyra realized, adventurers, just like in the stories! It was all the princess could do to keep from squealing in delight. She picked up her drink and made her way through the crowd to where the three adventurers sat. Along the way, one stranger's hand brushed against her bum and another man stumbled and groped her breasts for balance, but she was sure those were just innocent accidents.

"Excuse me," she said, trying, and failing, to keep the eagerness out of her voice. "Are you three adventurers?"

All three of them, even the women, stared at the neckline of her robe, which had fallen open, exposing much of her fair, round breasts and nearly went down to her navel. She adjusted her robe, blushing and asked again. "You know, wandering heroes and the like?"

The large man cleared his throat and glanced at his two companions. "You could … you could call us that, yes. Why? Do you have a quest for us?"

"A quest? Oh, no, I just love adventurers." The man grinned at that, and she continued. "Let me see, you must be the fighter in the group, and you're the mage, which would make you the thief."

"Thief?" the woman in the cloak and leather repeated. "I'm no thief! I'm a rogue. I haven't stolen a copper since I got here, and you can't prove otherwise."

"Oh, I beg your pardon, miss, I didn't mean to imply anything." Kyra couldn't believe herself. She hadn't been with these people for two minutes, and she had already embarrassed herself.

"Of course," the rouge continued, "if I wanted to, I could steal lots of things, like this." She held up the cloth belt that had been tied around Kyra's waist.

The princess looked down and saw that her robe had fallen open even more than it had before, nearly exposing her nipples and showing off her panties and inner thighs entirely. The mage smirked and the fighter laughed out loud as Kyra's face turned red and she closed her robe again. That was the second time she had embarrassed herself in as many seconds, and the night was still young.

"I apologize again for any offense, good rogue," Kyra said. "Could I have the belt back, please?"

The rogue shook her head. "No, this is payment for your drink, unless you were planning on buying it with all the gold you don't have in your pockets. Of course, a pretty girl like you, the barkeep might have settled your debt by having you dance naked on the tables tell everyone went to bed."

That was … that was a good point. Kyra hadn't brought any money with her. As a princess, she had never needed any, but unless she wanted to announce her station to everyone she met, she was going to need to be more careful.

"Don't mind Viss," the fighter said. "Come, sit down and drink with us. My name is Jorgan, and the mage is Silys."

"It's a pleasure to meet you," Kyra said, sitting down carefully, and she meant it. Despite the exposure, she had always wanted to meet a group of adventurers. "My name is Kyra."

"If you don't have a quest, Kyra," the mage, Silys asked, "what is this about? Do you wish to join our party?"

Kyra's eyes grew wide. "You're throwing a party?" And they were inviting her? Best day ever!

Viss rolled her eyes. "No, we are a party. That's what you call a group of adventurers."

"Oh. Right." Idiot. "Um, I'd loved to, but I don't know what good I'd be in a fight."

Viss shrugged. "Clerics are best farthest from danger anyway."

"Cleric? What makes you think I'm a cleric?"

"You're clearly dressed in the white robe of the goddess Tickla," Silys said. "Though I can understand why you wouldn't want to draw attention to that."

They thought she was a priestess? "Well, I mean, I know how to pray, but I wouldn't call myself an actual priestess."

Jorgen shrugged. "So you're level one. Everyone starts somewhere. What's your WIS at?"

"My wis?" Kyra asked. "I've been, um, whizzing my whole life, though I don't know what that–"

"Perfect! You'll be a full fledged cleric in no time. You look like your STR is pretty low, no offense, but you clearly maxed out your CHR, and I would love to test out your DEX, if you know what I mean."

She didn't. "Um, thank you?"

Jorgen slammed his mug on the table. "Then that settles it! Welcome to the party, Kyra, priestess of Tickla!"

Kyra smiled, hoping that she wasn't blaspheming a goddess she honestly hadn't even heard of. "That's great! Thank you very much for inviting me. So, um, what happens now?"

After that, the four of them worked out the sleeping arrangements, and Kyra had a choice to make. Either she could try to squeeze in with Silys and Viss in their small room and their smaller bed, or she could double with Jorgen. That wouldn't nearly be appropriate, but the fighter seemed like a perfect gentlemen to her, and they were all in the same party.

What did she decide?
1543.title: She meets a group of adventurers

info.brief_description: Princess Kyra journeys into the unknown world, getting caught in ticklish situations.
info.description:
In some place and time, a world of magic exist where humans live alongside with mythical creatures. Dwelling within the largest castle, Kyra had lived a very sheltered life, and her position as a princess had her grew up in a wealthy environment, nurtured with the best of care from everyone in her family. As far as her memories takes her back, she had always yearned to go on an adventure. Stories of legends and myths along with rumors had made the world such a fascinating place that was not even fully explored. She was 16 years old, and she wanted to explore the outside world with her own two curious eyes.

Very few had witnessed the presence of Kyra, but those who did would spread the rumors of how beautiful she was. Pretty, cute, adorable, kind, and polite, there had been many boys who aspire to become her prince. The stories of her had made one particular witch very jealous. No one knew the witch's name, but her reputation was notoriously well known. Many have searched out of their ways to find her while others would stay away from her. Legends claimed that the witch would grant a wish in exchange for something else, whereas the cost will forever be a mystery until you accept the deal.

One evening, the witch had paid a visit to the princess' room, uninvited. Awoken from her sleep, Kyra heard the sweet yet poisonous words from the figure in the shadow, luring her in on the deal to go out on an adventure. The witch's magic shall help her escape from the highly-guarded castle. The guards had always been the main reason why the girl could never run away from home, but this was a once in a lifetime opportunity.

Of course, the naive little girl accepted the deal. A contract had been set, and the witch's plot to feed her jealousy towards this princess had now begun. What the foolish little girl did not know was that the witch's magic had made every conscious being that she come across to lust over her curvaceous figure as well as an intense yearning to tickle her sensitive, untouched and untainted body.

With her wish finally coming true, Kyra absconded from her home to venture out into the unknown world.
